items.content_html: Very lightweight reminder app using React + Tauri, with drag and drop, notifications, tray icon and global shortcuts.
items.title: Victiniiiii/SushiReminder: Very lightweight reminder app using React + Tauri, with drag and drop, notifications, tray icon and global shortcuts.

items.content_html: Weather App is a lightweight, browser-based application that allows users to search for real-time weather information by city. It uses the OpenWeather API to retrieve current temperature and weather forecasts. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and is simple enough to be run locally without needing a backend server.
items.title: Udykay267/Weather-App: Weather App is a lightweight, browser-based application that allows users to search for real-time weather information by city. It uses the OpenWeather API to retrieve current temperature and weather forecasts. The app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and is simple enough to be run locally without needing a backend server.

items.content_html: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
items.title: AR10Dev/DragBoard: A lightweight, responsive Kanban board application built with React, Redux Toolkit, and react-beautiful-dnd. This project provides a Trello-like task management interface with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality for organizing workflow and tracking project progress.
